member.name: T:WinControl.WinControl
member.summary:
Represents a control that contains multiple forms that share the same space on the screen.
Элемент управления, содержащий набор форм, которые используют общее пространство на экране.

member.summary:

member.summary:

member.summary:
Gets or sets a value indicating whether manual tab repositioning is enabled.

member.summary:

member.summary:
Gets or sets the image displayed by the control when pages don't exist.

member.name: P:WinControl.WinControl.MessageText
member.summary:

member.name: P:WinControl.WinControl.MessageFont
member.summary:

member.summary:

member.summary:
